N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6029.5-A - Exemptions

State Regulations

Some of the requirements for the existing or
prospective security guard, special security guard or armed security guard
instructor may be waived by the commissioner if the existing or prospective
security guard, special security guard or armed security guard instructor is
employed with or at a public or private educational institution operating under
the purview of the New York State Education Department or an equivalent agency
in another jurisdiction, a public entity, an entity employing security guards
on a proprietary basis for its own use, or an educational institution conducted
on a not-for-profit basis by firms or organizations, provided that such
instruction is offered at no charge; or is an employed police or peace officer
in good standing. Notes
